name: Full | Tv - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: A TV cabinet that integrates with the Full family of cabinets made for the living room and bedroom. Designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 2020, Full TV, available in two different sizes, has a structure and base made in solid American walnut. It is characterized both by its horizontally elongated volumes and by the many possibilities for customization it offers. The drawer fronts and sides can be upholstered in different materials, such as ebony, fabric, or leather, or they can be lacquered in different NCS/RAL colours. It also has LED lighting with remote control for the central compartment and offers storage solutions with customizable solid maple dividers.
